rapsim 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

addComponent()

Add a new component to sim file

apsimOut2Nc()

Post-processing APSIM outputs into netcdf files

changeAttribute()

Change attribute for a xml element

clusterRunPreparingTask()

Preparing task table for APSIM simulations

componentTemplate()

Get template by component

compressInputs()

Compress the input files

fertiliseAtFixed()

Add fertilizaton at fixed date component

fertiliseAtSowing()

Add fertilizaton at sowing component

findElement()

Find a row for element name

findXmlValue()

Find the values with key from xml

generateSim()

Generate simulations according several factors

getElementVlaue()

Replace a row for element name

irrigationAtFixedDate()

Add irrigation at fixed date component

minimumAPSIM()

Create the minimum requirements to run an APSIM simulation (APSIM 7.5)

minimumR()

Prepare minimum R through only copying necessary files.

ncClose()

Synonymy with nc_close in ncdf4 package

ncCreateApsim()

Create netcdf file for APSIM

ncFactorLevels()

Obtain factor levels from a netCDF file

ncGetDimNames()

Get all dimension names for one variables

ncGetStart()

Obtain start according dimension levels

ncGetTraits()

Obtain trait value from a netCDF file

ncOpen()

Synonymy with nc_open in ncdf4 package

ncReadApsimIndex()

Convert factor levels to index

ncReadApsimOut()

Read APSIM out file

ncSubset()

Obtain a subset from several nc files.

ncTraitList()

Obtain trait list from a netCDF file

ncUpdateApsim()

Update netcdf file

readApsimHead()

Read head information from out file

readApsimOut()

Read apsim out file

removeAttribure()

Remove all attribure of a vector

removeComponent()

Remove a component from sim file

replaceElementVlaue()

Replace a row for element name

simPrefix()

Generate the sim prefix with md5

splitTitle()

Split a title
